title: Consider the Audience's Interest
text: Engaging the audience from the start is crucial for maintaining their attention.

title: Create a Connection
text: A story or anecdote can create a personal connection with the audience.

title: Avoid Overloading Information
text: Starting with too much information can overwhelm the audience.

title: Capture Attention Immediately
text: An engaging introduction sets the tone for the rest of the presentation.

hintAnswer: Begin with a compelling story or anecdote.
title: Select the Best Option
text: Choose the option that best captures the audience's attention from the start.
choices: Begin with a compelling story or anecdote.
List all the key points you will cover.
